snippet: Kevin Ward was killed when he was hit by Stewart’s car after Ward left his car during a sprint track race in upstate New York.
abstract: Family of Kevin Ward Jr files suit against Nascar driver Tony Stewart, who struck and killed Ward as he walked onto race track at Canandaigua Motorsports Park.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Ward was killed when he was hit by Stewart’s car after Ward left his car during a sprint track race in upstate New York.

headline.main: Family of Dead Driver Sues Tony Stewart
headline.print_headline: Family of Dead Driver Sues Stewart for Negligence

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
